videos.title: Olympics Will Be Narrated by Artificial Intelligence 🤖. #ia #technology
videos.description:
In this video, we discuss NBC's groundbreaking decision to use artificial intelligence to chronicle the highlights of the 2024 Olympics, featuring the voice of legendary sportscaster Al Michaels. We explore how AI is transforming sports coverage and the technology's impact on live broadcasts.

NBC will utilize the AI-generated voice of Al Michaels to bring a unique, futuristic experience to viewers. Discover how this technology works, the benefits and challenges of its application in the world of sports.

Watch and leave your comments about what you think of this technological innovation!

#2024Olympics #NBC #Artificial Intelligence #AINarration #AlMichaels #Technological Innovation #Sports"

videos.title: AI and Post-Death Voice: From Fiction to Reality - A Current Dilemma.  #ia #artificialintelligence
videos.description: We explore the use of post-mortem voice with artificial intelligence. This use raises ethical questions about the future of voices in digital media, echoing the controversy generated by last year's Volkswagen commercial, which digitally resurrected the voice of late singer Elis Regina. How does technology redefine our interactions with the past and present?
tags: use of AI in the media

How does technology redefine our interactions with the past and present? Find out more in this video.

videos.title: AI at the Olympics, Microsoft controversies about data use, Goal vs Government 🇧🇷 | Weekly Summary #3
videos.description:
In this episode, we explore the latest controversies and innovations in the world of artificial intelligence: the position of Microsoft's head of AI on the use of internet data, TikTok's new attack on Meta with a new social network, as well as NBC using AI with Al Michaels for Olympics coverage.

00:00:00 PRESENTATION
00:01:54 MICROSOFT AI HEAD HAS CONTROVERSIAL SPEECHES ABOUT THE USE OF DATA
00:09:20 ADOBE'S TERMS OF USE ALREADY GAVE THE PEOPLE TO TALK LAST MONTH
00:14:30 BRAZILIAN GOVERNMENT SENDS GOAL TO SUSPEND USE OF DATA FOR AI
00:18:39 NBC WILL USE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IN THE OLYMPICS 
00:20:00 VOLKSWAGEN COMMERCIAL WITH ELIS REGINA MADE WITH AI
00:33:00 OWNER OF TIKTOK LAUNCHES NEW SOCIAL NETWORK TO COMPETE WITH INSTAGRAM
00:36:50 CLOSING

videos.title: AI: Opportunity or Obstacle for Startups? #technology #business #ia
videos.description: In this video, we discuss how artificial intelligence is impacting the emergence of new startups. Is AI smoothing the path for innovators or creating unexpected challenges?

videos.title: AI or Human? The Challenge of Big Techs in the era of manipulated images #ia #technology
videos.description: In this video, we explore the growing challenge for big technology companies to distinguish between AI-generated and human-generated content. We discussed how editing tools can complicate this distinction, and analyzed a NYTimes study that revealed how average people can't differentiate between AI and human restaurant reviews on Yelp.

videos.title: AI: Worrying Energy Consumption ⚠️ #ia #sustainability #technology #climate
videos.description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the world, but at what cost? Data centers, which power AI, are consuming more and more energy. Studies indicate that data center energy consumption is expected to double by 2026, driven mainly by the increased use of artificial intelligence. This growth poses a significant threat to the environment at a critical time of climate crisis. In this video, we explore the environmental impact of this increase in energy, the consequences for the planet and what we can do to mitigate these effects. Join us in this urgent discussion and discover how technology is shaping our ecological future.
